column1: '''At the Green Dragon''' is the ninth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was not featured in the theatrical release of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
